commit.message:
specify more isl codegen options

	* graphite-optimize-isl.c: Include isl/ast_build.h
	(optimize_isl): Set several isl_options_set_* options.

Co-Authored-By: Sebastian Pop <s.pop@samsung.com>

From-SVN: r231467
